text: Albert Oehlen (born 17 September 1954) is a contemporary German painter. He lives and works mostly in Bühler, Switzerland. Born in Krefeld, West Germany, he moved to Berlin in 1977. He became one of the most important German painters of his generation, influenced by neoexpressionism. His work has divided critics.Hans W. Holzwarth, 100 Contemporary Artists A-Z (Taschen's 25th anniversary special ed.), Cologne, Taschen, 2009, pp. 434–441 ==References== ==Related pages== *List of German painters Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:German painters
title: Albert Oehlen
